section.title: Installing and Configuring the Image Service
section.para: Configure the backend data store. For MySQL, create a glance MySQL database and a glance MySQL user. Grant the "gance" user full access to the glance MySQL database.
Edit /etc/glance/glance-registry.conf to include the --sql_connection to use the backend data store you just created.
Create the tables in your backend data store:

Now you can load your initial image and spin up your first VM if you want to use the EC2 API and euca- commands. For the Compute API and Dashboard integration, you need to install the OpenStack Identity service, Keystone.
